item.title: Bonus Points
item.description: Para este reto se proporciona un binario undefined8 main(void) { uint __seed; int iVar1; char local_1a [10]; int local_10; uint local_c; local_c = 0; __seed = getpid(); srand(__seed); iVar1 = rand(); local_c = iVar1 % 100; puts("Hello, here you can get some bonus points for the competition.
